name: Pool Duel
description:
POOL DUEL is here!

With easy-to-learn touch controls and superbly accurate gameplay, POOL DUEL is the realistic 8-Ball Pool simulation where you can pit yourself against other competitors for REAL MONEY PRIZES.

Pick your shots, fine tune your aim, and dominate the table to set a high score. Whether you win or lose, post your score in a head-to head competition against another real player... Prove your talent, take on your rivals, and emerge victorious to win the pot.

POOL DUEL uses the Skillz online competition platform to bring eSports home so that everyone can participate.

- Compete for REAL MONEY or just play for fun using Skillz virtual currency
- The more you practice, the better you play: Master real 8-Ball Pool skills like draw, english and bank shots
- Challenge players around the world and become a POOL DUEL champion
- Climb the Skillz leaderboards for the chance to win big prizes

Cash tournaments are available in about 75% of the world. Cash tournaments are not enabled in the following states: AZ, AR, CT, DE, FL, IL, LA, MD, MT, SC, SD, and TN. If you do not live in a cash-enabled region, you can still play for fun with our virtual currency.

If you have any questions about the Skillz system or cash tournaments please contact: support@skillz.com
